summary: This single arm, open label study will assess the efficacy and safety of and compliance to treatment with Bonviva/Boniva (ibandronate) in biphosphonate-na誰ve patients with post-menopausal osteoporosis. Patients will receive Bonviva/Boniva at a dose of 3 mg intravenously every three months. Anticipated time on study treatment is 12 months with a follow-up of 12 months.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Mean Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Month 12
